SELECT md."name" AS "deptName", d."name" AS "doctorName", dsi."id" AS "deptSubId", dsi."name" AS "deptSubName", wp."id" AS "workPlanId", wp."date" AS "date" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_WORK_PLAN wp INNER JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d on wp."doctor_id" = d."id" INNER JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB dsi on wp."dept_sub_id" = dsi."id" INNER JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT md on dsi."dept_id" = md."id"
WHERE wp."date" BETWEEN TO_DATE('${startDate}') AND TO_DATE('${endDate}')
AND dsi."dept_id" = ${deptId}
AND d."name" LIKE '%${doctorName}%'
ORDER BY dsi."id", wp."date"
